premise_source_doc_sentence: Sarah Catharine Paulson  (  born December 17 , 1974  )  is an American actress .

claim: Sarah Paulson acts only in stage productions.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After beginning her acting career on stage , she starred in the 1990s television series American Gothic  (  1995 -- 96  )  and Jack & Jill  (  1999 -- 2001  )  .

claim: Sarah Paulson acts only in stage productions.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Paulson later appeared in comedy films such as What Women Want  (  2000  )  and Down with Love  (  2003  )  , and had dramatic roles in films such as Path to War  (  2002  )  and The Notorious Bettie Page  (  2005  )  .

claim: Sarah Paulson acts only in stage productions.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Paulson has appeared on Broadway in the plays The Glass Menagerie  (  2005  )  and Collected Stories  (  2010  )  .

claim: Sarah Paulson acts only in stage productions.
premise_source_doc_sentence: She later starred in the independent drama Martha Marcy May Marlene  (  2011  )  , and received Primetime Emmy Award and Golden Globe Award nominations for her performance as Nicolle Wallace in the HBO film Game Change  (  2012  )  .

claim: Sarah Paulson acts only in stage productions.
premise_source_doc_sentence: For her work throughout the series , she has been nominated for four Primetime Emmy Awards  (  2013 -- 16  )  and won two Critics ' Choice Television Awards for Best Supporting Actress in a Movie/Miniseries  (  2013 and 2015  )  .

claim: Sarah Paulson acts only in stage productions.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Billie Dean Howard  (  Sarah Paulson  )  , Marcy  (  Christine Estabrook  )  , Dr. Charles Montgomery  (  Matt Ross  )  , Sister Mary Eunice McKee  (  Lily Rabe  )  , Dr. Arthur Arden  (  James Cromwell as old Arden ; John Cromwell as young Arden  )  , Pepper  (  Naomi Grossman  )  , Queenie  (  Gabourey Sidibe  )  and Lana Winters  (  Sarah Paulson  )  are the eight characters to appear in more than one season of the series .
